name: 鄭振宗
objective:
先修課程：負責教授同意
.
第一部份（電工原理）：
電機工程簡介, 類比電路基礎, 直流電阻電路分析法, 交流電路分析, 暫態分析, 正弦頻率響應, 濾波器, Bode plots, 交流功率, 電磁學, 變壓器
.
第二部分（電工實驗）：
實驗一、電路基本工具與測量原理
實驗二、串並聯直流電路
實驗三、示波器與波型產生器
實驗四、RC電路與時間常數
實驗五、電感的電壓與電流
實驗六、RLC共振
實驗七、濾波器
schedule:
========================Week 1========================
Grading Policies and Syllabus of lectures
Ch.1 Introduction to Electrical Engineering
-1.1 Electrical Engineering
-1.2 Electrical Engineering as a Foundation for the Design of Mechatronic Systems
-1.3 Fundamentals of Engineering Exam Review
-1.4 Brief History of Electrical Engineering
-1.5 System of Units
.
========================Week 2========================
Ch.2 Fundamentals of Electric Circuits
-2.1 Definitions
-2.2 Charge, Current, AND Kirchhoff's Current Law
-2.3 Voltage and Kirchhoff's Voltage Law
-2.4 Electric Power and Sign Convention
-2.5 Circuit Elements and Their i-v characteristics
-2.6 Resistance and Ohm's Law
-2.7 Practical Voltage and Current Sources
-2.8 Measuring Devices
.
========================Week 3========================
實驗一、電路基本工具與測量原理 (Lab #1: Tools and Measurement Devices)
.
========================Week 4========================
國慶日放假一天 (Double Tens Day)
.
========================Week 5========================
Ch.3 Resistive Network Analysis (1/2)
-3.1 Network Analysis
-3.2 The Node Voltage Method
-3.3 The Mesh Current Method
-3.4 Node and Mesh Analysis with Controlled Sources
.
========================Week 6========================
實驗二、串並聯直流電路 (Lab #2: Series and Parallel DC Circuits)
.
========================Week 7========================
Ch.3 Resistive Network Analysis (2/2)
-3.5 The Principle of Superposition
-3.6 One-port Networks and Equivalent
-3.7 Maximum Power Transfer
-3.8 Nonlinear Circuit Elements
.
========================Week 8========================
實驗三、示波器與波型產生器 (Lab #3: Oscilloscope and Waveform Generator)
.
========================Week 9========================
Midterm Exam
.
========================Week 10========================
Ch.4 AC Network Analysis
-4.1 Energy Storage (Dynamic) Circuit Elements
-4.2 Time-dependent Signal Sources
-4.3 Solution of Circuits Containing Energy Storage Elements (Dynamic Circuits)
-4.4 Phasor Solution of Circuits with Sinusoidal Excitations
-4.5 AC Circuit Analysis Methods
.
========================Week 11======================
Ch.5 Transient Analysis 
-5.1 Transient Analysis 
-5.2 Writing Differential Equations for Circuits
-5.3 DC Steady-state Solution of Circuits Containing Inductors and Capacitors--Initial and Final Conditions
-5.4 Transient Response of First-Order Circuits
-5.5 Transient Response of Second-order Circuits
.
========================Week 12======================
實驗四、RC電路與時間常數 (Lab #4: RC circuit and time constants)
實驗五、電感的電壓與電流 (Lab #5: Voltage and Current of Inductors)
.
========================Week 13======================
Ch.6 Frequency Response and System Concepts
-6.1 Sinusoidal Frequency Response
-6.2 Fourier Analysis
-6.3 Filters
-6.4 Bode Plots
.
========================Week 14======================
實驗七、濾波器 (Lab #7: Filters)
.
========================Week 15======================
Ch.7 AC Power
-7.1 Power in AC circuits
-7.2 Complex Power
-7.3 Transformers
-7.4 Three-phase Power
-7.5 Residential Wiring: Grounding and Safety
-7.6 Generation and Distribution of AC power
.
========================Week 16======================
實驗六、RLC共振 (Lab #6: RLC Resonance)
.
========================Week 17======================
Ch.18 Principles of Electromechanics
-18.1 Electricity and Magnetism
-18.2 Magnetic Circuits
-18.3 Magnetic Materials and B-H curves
-18.4 Transformers
-18.5 Electromechanical Energy Conversion
.
========================Week 18======================
Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Homework, Quizzes and Lab: 1/3
Midterm Exam: 1/3
Final Exam: 1/3
materials: Rizzoni, “Principle and Applications of Electrical Engineering”, 5/e, McGraw-Hill. 滄海書局
